name: Tails of Yarn
description:
Pawsome Fun Fur All!

Hit around your yarn ball all around the pet store in order to find your furry friends. Make sure you avoid the bad kitties while you explore in this kinetic cat puzzle game by Team Beans. 

Paws On! (and on)

Additional Gameplay Videos:

Artist - Meli Jackson

Artist - Kelu Rushing

Designer - Gracie Sanabria

Programmer - Noah Lam

In Loving Memory of Toby,  A Loving Cat and Inspiration for Our Game
